name: OhMyBallZ
description:
**WARNING : The ingame instructions are in French only, please refer to the screenshots on this page for english instructions**

SNOOOWWWMEEENNN !!
Welcome to the hot potato tournament championship !

In this game, you'll compete with 3 other players to avoid the hot potato. If you're touched, you'll have to shoot the potato to touch another player.

When you got the potato, your life (xx% in the bottom of the screen) will decrease. The winner is the one which has more life at the end of the 120s timer.

GO FOR IT DUDES !

This game was done during Global Game Jam 2018.
